sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY CORRELAB FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.CORRELATIV > $ultimoLista$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY A.CORRELATIV, CORRELAB FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY) C

SELECT C.* FROM( SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.CORRELATIV < $primeroLista$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY A.CORRELATIV DESC , B.CORRELATIV DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY) C ORDER BY C.CORRELAB

SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG = $fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY CORRELAB DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY ) AS C ORDER BY CORRELAB ASC

SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 AS A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 AS B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=#perpag# AND B.TIPOBS='1' AND TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ)=#ruttrabaj# AND TRIM(A.NROFOL)=#nrofol# ORDER BY B.NROFOL

SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050T AS A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054T AS B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=#perpag# AND B.TIPOBS='1' AND TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ)=#ruttrabaj# AND TRIM(A.NROFOL)=#nrofol# ORDER BY B.NROFOL

SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT A.CODOPE, A.TPOFOR, TRIM(A.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(A.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, A.FECEMI, A.DIASUB, A.MTOLIQ, A.MTOCOT, A.CODINT, A.FINIPA, A.MOCOPE, A.BASECA, A.IDLICE, A.INIMES, A.TPOLIC, A.NDICOT, A.NDIINC, A.NDIPAG, A.MTSBPA, A.MTSBDI, A.MCSEGC, A.MOTCOT, TRIM(A.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, A.CCOPGO, TRIM(A.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, A.SUBMAT, A.TPOLIQ, A.FECPGO, A.MLIQPA, A.RIMPMS, A.PERPAG, A.CORRELATIV, A.PAGFOL, A.LICHASFEC, B.NOMARCH, B.NROCMPO, B.CMPREF, B.DESCRI, B.TIPOBS, B.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=#perpag# AND B.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY CORRELAB) C
UPPER(TRIM(C.NROFOL)) like '%$nrofol$%'
UPPER(TRIM(C.RUTTRABAJ)) like '%$ruttrabaj$%'
fetch FIRST $periodo$ ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*)AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' GROUP BY A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC,A.PAGFOL ORDER BY A.NROFOL) C

SELECT C.CODOPE, C.TPOFOR, TRIM(C.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(C.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, C.FECEMI, C.DIASUB, C.MTOLIQ, C.MTOCOT, C.CODINT, C.FINIPA, C.MOCOPE, C.BASECA, C.IDLICE, C.INIMES, C.TPOLIC, C.NDICOT, C.NDIINC, C.NDIPAG, C.MTSBPA, C.MTSBDI, C.MCSEGC, C.MOTCOT, TRIM(C.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, C.CCOPGO, TRIM(C.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, C.SUBMAT, C.TPOLIQ, C.FECPGO, C.MLIQPA, C.RIMPMS, C.PERPAG, C.CORRELATIV, C.PAGFOL, C.LICHASFEC, D.NOMARCH, D.NROCMPO, D.CMPREF, D.DESCRI, D.TIPOBS, D.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB, D.PAGFOL, D.LICHASFEC FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM LIEXP.ILFJAAUX A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL050 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRABAJ AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL ) C INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.* FROM LIEXP.ILFJAAUX A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL ) D ON C.PERPAG=D.PERPAG AND C.NROFOL=D.NROFOL AND C.RUTTRABAJ=D.RUTTRAB AND C.LICHASFEC=D.LICHASFEC AND C.PAGFOL=D.PAGFOL WHERE C.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND D.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY C.NROFOL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CODOPE, C.TPOFOR, TRIM(C.NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(C.RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, C.FECEMI, C.DIASUB, C.MTOLIQ, C.MTOCOT, C.CODINT, C.FINIPA, C.MOCOPE, C.BASECA, C.IDLICE, C.INIMES, C.TPOLIC, C.NDICOT, C.NDIINC, C.NDIPAG, C.MTSBPA, C.MTSBDI, C.MCSEGC, C.MOTCOT, TRIM(C.OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, C.CCOPGO, TRIM(C.INSSAL) AS INSSAL, C.SUBMAT, C.TPOLIQ, C.FECPGO, C.MLIQPA, C.RIMPMS, C.PERPAG, C.CORRELATIV, C.PAGFOL, C.LICHASFEC, D.NOMARCH, D.NROCMPO, D.CMPREF, D.DESCRI, D.TIPOBS, D.CORRELATIV AS CORRELAB, D.PAGFOL, D.LICHASFEC FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM LIEXP.ILFJAAUX A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL050 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRABAJ AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL ) C INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.* FROM LIEXP.ILFJAAUX A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL ) D ON C.PERPAG=D.PERPAG AND C.NROFOL=D.NROFOL AND C.RUTTRABAJ=D.RUTTRAB AND C.LICHASFEC=D.LICHASFEC AND C.PAGFOL=D.PAGFOL WHERE C.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND D.TIPOBS='1' ORDER BY C.NROFOL DESC ) AS D ORDER BY D.NROFOL ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFJAAUX ( NROFOL, RUTTRABAJ, PERPAG, LICHASFEC, PAGFOL, TPOPROC, USUARIO) SELECT A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC , A.PAGFOL, '1' TPOPROC, '$usuario$' USUARIO FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' GROUP BY A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL ORDER BY A.NROFOL FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY WITH NC

INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFJAAUX ( NROFOL, RUTTRABAJ, PERPAG, LICHASFEC, PAGFOL, TPOPROC, USUARIO) SELECT A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL, '1' TPOPROC, '$usuario$' USUARIO FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND A.NROFOL > '$ultimoNroFolio$' AND B.TIPOBS='1' GROUP BY A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL ORDER BY A.NROFOL FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY WITH NC

INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFJAAUX ( NROFOL, RUTTRABAJ, PERPAG, LICHASFEC, PAGFOL, TPOPROC, USUARIO) SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL, '1' TPOPROC, '$usuario$' USUARIO FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND A.NROFOL < '$primerNroFolio$' AND B.TIPOBS='1' GROUP BY A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL ORDER BY A.NROFOL DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY) C ORDER BY C.NROFOL WITH NC

INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFJAAUX ( NROFOL, RUTTRABAJ, PERPAG, LICHASFEC, PAGFOL, TPOPROC, USUARIO) SELECT A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC , A.PAGFOL, '1' TPOPROC, '$usuario$' USUARIO FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL=B.NROFOL AND A.RUTTRABAJ=B.RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1' GROUP BY A.NROFOL, A.RUTTRABAJ, A.PERPAG, A.LICHASFEC, A.PAGFOL ORDER BY A.NROFOL DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY WITH NC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM LIEXP.ILFJAAUX WHERE TPOPROC='1' AND PERPAG=#perpag# AND USUARIO=#usuario# WITH NC
